website_summaries.verdict: Except for some of the names and general design philosophy, Supreme Commander 2 doesn't bear much resemblance to the original Supreme Commander. If you're okay with that, you'll be okay with the game.
pros: Nice variation among single-player (campaign), skirmish, and online multiplayer modes
cons: Greatly simplified graphics and gameplay compared to the first game
May be too easy for experienced RTS players

customer_reviews.title: Modern day Command & Conquer
customer_reviews.text: Lots of games have tried to build upon the success of C&C over the years, but most havent done it. This is a great game. The Story mode will teach you most of what you need to know to play the game, and then there are a huge number of skirmish maps. The main things i like about these are: - Many different maps - The Tactics you employ need to change depending on the size of the map, as well as the number (and difficulty) of the enemy teams Good game and at this price an absolute steal.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Hannam

customer_reviews.title: This is like C&C on steroids
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, myself and my son have not stopped playing it since bought!!, We loved C&C and before buying this loved C&C , This is like C&C on steroids, huge units excellent game play, best RTS I have ever played, graphically stunning! Plays very similar to C&C we were in and fighting battles within 10 mins
customer_reviews.author: M Ginn

customer_reviews.title: okay what did they do to supreme commander.
customer_reviews.text: okay what did they do to supreme commander. This is not quite the same as forged alliance which is not the first sup com but it is a massive jump forward this just falls backward
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Hi I started up the game and started to download it and it says there is another steam account with it on ?
customer_reviews.author: George Bean

customer_reviews.title: Agree with others, way inferior than supcom 1
customer_reviews.text: If you come from a starcraft background and never player the original, this is 3-star. OK to play for a while, but wont last long. There are about 25 different units in total, all factions! If you played the original, then this is a big disappointment -- story is highly disconnected as well, so don't buy it if you just want to see the follow up story.
customer_reviews.author: httr

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to the origional
customer_reviews.text: They changed the game drastically from the original, while its still an ok game it lacks the scope of the first sup comm
customer_reviews.author: Stuart O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Love the game and I got for a friend to play
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I cannot install this product in my computador. After the registration in site. The installation says: invalid product key.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Supreme Commander 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my son; he is playing it all the time! The graphics are very good and I was impressed by them. It was good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: nickc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great game well worth buying and is a good price. Can play this for hours and not get bored if its your sort of game. Buy and try.
customer_reviews.author: prmdc098

customer_reviews.title: Great game, smaller than SUupreme Commander 1
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed playing Supreme Commander 1 and although the SC2 maps seem smaller, it's still fun which also leads to faster skirmish games. The Multi-tier factories has also been replaced with a different type of unit upgrades, by research. This, again, leads to each map leading to a quick 'research' build to achieve better skills and power upgrades etc. Overall, although it's not as 'big' as SC1, it's still a valid purchase and I did enjoy the single player(s) campaign.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a suitable sequal
customer_reviews.text: Although this game may be ok as a stratergy game if you're looking for a true sequal to the epic scale of supcom 1, this certainly isnt it. It has some innovatice features but overall its much smaller, definitly not epic in any means of the word and overall a very dissapointing game given its legendary predecessors.
customer_reviews.author: I. J. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Supreme game.
customer_reviews.text: I have the first one and this second one puts that in the shade,it is pretty good graphically and the game play is the usual battle senarios,yes this is well worth a punt......
customer_reviews.author: John Foulger

customer_reviews.title: I am Very pleased with My Order
customer_reviews.text: I am Very pleased with My Order. Top of the range item meets all my requirments. Pronpt delivery, Arrived on time Value for money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G.v Broad

customer_reviews.title: What was once a great game - now ruined by the Xbox360!
customer_reviews.text: The original games of the first series were superb...literally endless gameplay & amazing graphics provided by a good high-end PC graphics card. This second game is an absolute shambles nowhere near as good as the orignal games. Poor visuals with limited areas of gampeplay - SIMPLY CAUSED BY DEGRADING THE GAME SO IT IS ABLE TO PLAY ON THE INFERIOR CONSOLE PLATFORM! This game should never have been released for the console - consoles just dont cut the mustard when it comes to graphical processing power...and they never will. This is what happens when to convert a game that is designed for a PC onto the inferior console.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Why People hating!? Amazing game ignore the negative feedback
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, way better than the first one, a lot more fast paste action But one match may take 2 hours!! (Online) Only downside to this game is not a lot of people playing online, you have to be on certain time (mainly late) to able to find a match quite fast. Impressive game Great price What else to say.
customer_reviews.author: TSDREX

customer_reviews.title: Its not supreme but it's fun.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the origional game , its a game that makes you think, like a proper strategy game should do. So when I first played the second game like others I was very dissapointed , it seemes like a game that was made a former shadow of its self - from an RTS point of veiw not terribly challenging and quite basic ,Most fans of the origional will notice the differences. But if I'm honest its a fun game to play if your the kind of person who wants to get straight into the action. It may not be as complex as the first game (and it's expansion) but enjoyable none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Chaines1991

customer_reviews.title: Supreme Commander 2
customer_reviews.text: Much as most the reviews from the people that played the first one. GFX is better but the game is nowhere near as much fun to play. ..........and being connected to steam is a pain in the ar*s It'll keep you going for a bit but gets boring quite quickly. One thing i did notice though is that the AI is a LOT harder to beat in standard (normal AI) than a lot of games similar including the first one! If you buy it cheap enough (like i did) than its OK value for money. Anything over a tenner is too much to be honest! Would i recomend it, prob not :(
customer_reviews.author: John Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Not so supreme Commander
customer_reviews.text: Graphics of the game are really good. But building the units, is way to easy specially the big ones. Once the big units are created its all over for your enemies (in scirmish). It's more off an arcade game now. A nice ad on could be a random map generator. Supreme Commander 1 is more fun, because it is more difficult to built the bigger units, and upgrade everything. You have too be a lot more careful with your resources. Research should be more expensive in SC2, its way to easy to build research center and gather the points.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tuyn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the first one
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations on this game. But It's not as good as the SUPCOM and SUPCOM:FA... the tech tree is interesting but the gameplay is much more limited that it used to be. IMHO the only pro is the ability to upgrade old units turning cannon fodder into more serious units. SUPCOM 2 too command and conquer like which is not a good thing. It looks like a bad console to PC game port. I stick to Total Annihilation, SUPCOM and SUPCOM:FA.
customer_reviews.author: MiiG

customer_reviews.title: Its Shrunk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Maps are much smaller than the original, units are boring and not enough unit choices. Also seems less realistic, too easy to have any fun and rather console. It may look prettier but that doesnt make up for gameplay, very dull and boring. I also give it 1 start for the steam requirements(Lots of companies seem to be doing this now, I personnaly hate it), I prefer the old style of games where you buy it and can install it whenever and wherever you want, without an internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Powell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game, spent many an hour trying to find an RTS that is as good as command and conquer. I have all C + C and completed all so wanted to find a new RTS. Tried many different titles but none and as good as C + C until now. Supreme Commander 2 is challaging and tractical. The game has a good story line and is not to easy. Would recommend to any C + C fans. Only paid £5 on Amazon and is well worth my hard earned dosh.
customer_reviews.author: Mazda6

customer_reviews.title: Good but a let down
customer_reviews.text: Supreme Commander 2 is a good game. If your computer didn't have the necessary specs for the first version this is a good alternative. However, if your computer is good enough to play the first game i would recommend getting that instead. If you already own the first game then as long as it plays well with out lagg then dont buy Supreme Commander 2 you will just be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jj Gedney-higham

customer_reviews.title: So sad that Total Annhilation came to this.
customer_reviews.text: I was a fan from the original games and played them endlessly, I expected to find at least the seeds of brilliance from that original format here in this new title, but this leaves me cold, feeling like I'm wasting my time playing such a soul-less game. Halfway through the first campaign I can't bear it anymore and am uninstalling, the kindest thing all round for this colourful, but lame duck. For me, a sad day for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Athlon

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This game is awful in comparison to Supreme Commander 1. It takes everything which is good about the series and ruins it! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: James Cook

customer_reviews.title: CD-KEY DUPLICATE ERROR
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was on time and the game seems to be packed and original. This game, might be nice, however It was not yet possible to install it as the delivered CD-KEY was apparently already in use. As it needs to be registered with STEAM with this key it was not possible to install the game. I contacted STEAM, send them a Receipt, a Photo picture of the game handbook also showing the "duplicated key" on it. I did not receive any answer yet. Now I am not sure if this seller or the game can be trusted. I would be happy to pay more if those problems would not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing sequel
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Supreme Commander 2 because I loved the first 2 versions of the game. I didn't expect much, but what I got was not a sequel worthy of the Supreme Commander name, the similarities with the original game makes it even more frustrating. What was a marked difference on the original game was overly simplified in this version, what we get is a game for console players without the will to learn how to play a more complex game. Oh well, we still have the originals games.
customer_reviews.author: ManuelFonseca

customer_reviews.title: Steam lets it down
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatly like most modern PC games Supreme Comander 2 has to be installed and downloaded with ''Steam'' which is a major let down. I waited 2 days in order to install and download the game,which begs the question what is the point in buying the disc? Once installed the game was fine and i would reccomend it, the graphics are sharp, the gameplay is good but the story needs improving with some awful acting at parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Better than the first!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the bad reviews. This game is better than the first in my opinion. You definitely get your money's worth playing all factions as usual, UEF, Aeon, Cibrin, one after the other with some awesome battles and an awesome ending that puts a smile on your face. Just when you think this has to be it now there's another bigger and better mission. It's very satisfying. It's actually like your playing an expansion also. Then you get to play all the skirmishes as each faction and there are loads! The weapons are bigger and better and there's still a bit of cheese in there much like the original. "Noooooooooo!" Great game. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cherrington

customer_reviews.title: Chris Taylor ought to be ashamed
customer_reviews.text: This is basically Supreme Commander FA. The only difference is, everything that made that game great has been removed from this version. This is what happens when you don't care what your audience want. Supreme Commander is an iconic game, SupCom 2 however is about as far removed from that status as can be conceived. It's a damn shame. You killed it CT.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. DELURY

customer_reviews.title: supreme commander 2
customer_reviews.text: I purchased game from Amazon and it doesnt even allow its installation, it comes up cd key already in use by another user. After several hour of trying with game maker and Amazon it seems i have waisted my money, as Amazon will not allow return as it was sealed and maker will not issue new cd key if game is purchased online and you need reciet as proof of when and where it was purchased. Hours waisted to try to play this game, worst game purchased ever.
customer_reviews.author: STAR TREK PC GAMES

customer_reviews.title: ou man
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst game I ever played. The predecessor is mutch time better, grafics are chines kiddy the campaigen for old war veterans. The races -or factions- not balanced, the hole game... it 's now fast, faster, much more faster. You have only one expansion stage for your units the only option to grate them up is a new ressource for a techtree with small upgrades
customer_reviews.author: T.Bot

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: I loved the original and FA. One of the best RTS games ever. This one is pointless. All the time taken and it is inferior to the original. Cynical grab at our money or cut down for the consoles. I am not sure but, keep your money or buy the original. They don't deserve the cash or the loyalty of fans.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Drysdale

customer_reviews.title: Skirmish
customer_reviews.text: If you play RTS for the skirmish rather than the single player then get this game. The single player is poor indeed but you do not need to play it. The skirmish is fantastic, complex levels of tech to research, hundreds of units, massive levels. This game has clearly been made with the tactical RTS gamer in mind and they have achieved their goal it's a real shame this game is judged by the quality of it's single player.
customer_reviews.author: Lamellama

customer_reviews.title: Unplayable
customer_reviews.text: Another game which is not playable after installing from DVD thanks to Steam. It takes over 50 minutes to perform an "update" after installing from the DVD. It should be clearly written that a game uses Steam so that everyone can stay as far away from this stuff as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: very good, negative amazon rating is quite harsh.
customer_reviews.text: This game is excellent. I love it. Its a different game from the original, shorter, faster paced and a little more exciting. The research points are great. I think that the other reviews on amazon are quite harsh. This is a great game, and if you liked supcom1 you will like this. Its definitely worth owning. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: dudetim
customer_reviews.text: Loved the game the graphics weren't as good as supreme commander but the storyline made up for it.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase a hard copy
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the post this morning, and went to install it straight away. Unfortunately the disc doesn't actually have the full game on it, and instead directs you to Steam where you need to download a 4GB file before you can play it. Very annoying anti piracy methods that are actually making me favour piracy now, you wouldn't get this problem with a ripped copy :/
customer_reviews.author: David Watson

customer_reviews.title: Supreme Commander 2
customer_reviews.text: Excellent graphics, the game plays well. I`m still trying to decide if I like the way the storyline changes your faction at times. I don`t think it is as difficult as the original game but enjoyable nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Shortell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent refreshing graphics and change over Command Conquer Generals/3
customer_reviews.text: A very different game but challenging and rewarding nevertheless. NO RTS freak should live without this game if you have a fast enough pc.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alimmarvasti

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Supreme Commander 2 is more polished, and flat out more fun than Supreme Commander. The faction diversity is far greater and there's many more strategic options. It runs smoothly, with very few bugs. I'm very pleased with it and I think it's got great potential. A lot of people don't like the game, just because it's not Forged Alliance again. Yes, it's a new game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Boyall

product_meta.title: Supreme Commander 2 (PC DVD)
product_meta.description:
Great Games and Accessories for the PC from Gamesbuyer.

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
Little is known about this environment, as its existence is routinely denied by the Coalition. Reports have leaked about it being a mesa above a devastated planet; others say there's some sort of artifactin the area. One thing's for sure: There's been a lot of air and land fighting over it.
